Tsuji Daishiro Japanese version SNS Account GitHub:d-tsuji Qiita:tutuz AtCoder(Competitive programming):tutuz Speakerdeck: https://speakerdeck.com/tutuz Job career Future Architect(2014/10ï½) I am a backend engineer.
